title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
Hi! I’m Neil - welcome to my blog! I’ll be sharing my learnings over here - I think blogs are the modern day equivalent of Ramanujan’s notebooks he sent to Hardy. I’m currently studying Electronics and Communications Engineering at BITS Pilani, although my interests vary. I hope you learn something from my experiences!

Filler image, for testing :)

title: Neil’s Corner of the Internet
text:
Hi! I’m Neil - I’m 20 years old, and I’m currently a junior at BITS Pilani majoring in Electronics and Communications Engineering. I’m generally interested in Mathematics and the Sciences, and this website is a glimpse into my attempts to make sense of the world. I hope you enjoy your stay!

title: About
text: Hi! I’m Neil - I’m 20, and I’m currently a junior at BITS Pilani. I’m majoring in Electronics and Communications Engineering, but I’m also very interested in Machine Learning, Quantum Computing, Mathematics, Physics, Cosmology, Biology, Palaeontology and Archaeology.
